edu.bonn.cs.iv.bonnmotion.models

类 DisasterArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bonn.cs.iv.bonnmotion.App
      • edu.bonn.cs.iv.bonnmotion.Scenario
        • edu.bonn.cs.iv.bonnmotion.RandomSpeedBase
          • edu.bonn.cs.iv.bonnmotion.models.DisasterArea
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Model, ScenarioLink

    public class DisasterArea
extends RandomSpeedBase
    Application to create movement scenarios according to the Reference Point Group Mobility model.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected double avgMobileNodesPerGroup
      Average nodes per group.
      protected CatastropheArea[] catastropheAreas
      Manage the CatastropheAreas .
      protected int groups
      Number of groups (not an input parameter!).
      protected double groupSizeDeviation
      Standard deviation of nodes per group.
      protected int maxCatastropheAreas
      Maximum number of CatastropheAreas .
      protected java.util.LinkedList<Obstacle>[] maxCObstacles
      Manage the C-Obstacles for maxdist.
      protected double maxdist
      Maximum deviation from group center [m].
      protected int maxGroupSize
      Size of largest group (not an input parameter!).
      protected java.util.LinkedList<Obstacle>[] minCObstacles
      Manage the C-Obstacles for mindist.
      protected double mindist
      Minimum space needed by group.
      static java.lang.String MODEL_NAME 
      protected int numCatastropheAreas
      Count the number of CatastropheAreas .
      protected java.util.LinkedList<Obstacle>[] obstacles
      Manage the Obstacles .
      protected double pGroupChange
      The probability for a node to change to a new group when moving into it's range.
